humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions two foci of invasive ductal carcinoma in the right breast. The largest focus measures 2.1 x 1.9 cm, which falls in the T2 category (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). Therefore, the T stage for this patient is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has two invasive ductal carcinomas in the right breast, one measuring 2.1 x 1.9 cm and the other measuring 0.9 x 0.8 cm. The T stage is determined by the size of the largest focus of invasive carcinoma. In this case, the largest focus is 2.1 cm, which falls under T2 (T2: tumor >2 cm in greatest dimension).
